item.title: 8/26@6pm - Join Scouting Night - 2024
item.description: Cub Scout Pack 120 invites your child to join Cub Scouts. In Scouts, your child will have lots of FUN, learn new things, and make new friends. Who: All youth, Kindergarten through Grade 5 Date: Monday, August 26th When: Anytime from 6pm to 7:30pm Where: Peak View Elementary School What: Ready to: Derby Cars & More Volunteers will be available to answer any questions from 6pm to 7:30pm. Interested in joining but canâ€™t attend?
